psico.title: Psychology Clinic
psico.description: All-in-One SaaS platform for psychology practice management, integrating scheduling, medical records, and financial control.
psico.challenge_text: Managing a solo practice suffers from fragmentation: scheduling via WhatsApp, finances in spreadsheets, and paper records. The challenge was to create a unified digital experience simple enough not to burden the workflow, yet robust enough to automate the financial cycle and offer patient autonomy.
psico.development_text: The priority was building a reactive, user-friendly interface, allowing the psychologist to focus on what matters: patient care. At the system's core, I designed a context segregation architecture that rigorously isolates the patient self-service portal from the clinical environment, ensuring absolute record privacy without sacrificing usability.
psico.result_text: The platform professionalized the clinical operation. The Patient Portal drastically reduced messaging back-and-forth for scheduling, while the financial module automated receipt issuance and cash flow control, giving back precious time for the main focus: patient care.

iase.title: IASE2
iase.description: Advanced telemetry and experiment management system for automotive engineering, in partnership with Renault and Horse.
iase.challenge_text: The challenge was creating an Edge-to-Cloud data pipeline robust enough to support critical data acquisition from moving vehicles via 5G. It was necessary to orchestrate remote embedded hardware configuration and ensure high-frequency file integrity, all while managing a complex infrastructure with multiple interdependent services.
iase.development_text: The solution required precise orchestration between services to ensure data integrity coming from the board. I developed control logic to synchronize high-frequency packet reception with disk persistence, avoiding I/O bottlenecks. On the frontend, the challenge was building a reactive state architecture capable of rendering high-density charts without freezing, allowing users to fluidly switch between live fleet monitoring and analyzing experiment reports.
iase.result_text: We transformed the test vehicle into a connected lab. The solution eliminated the physical barrier of field testing, allowing teams to configure experiments and analyze critical telemetry in real-time, drastically reducing the feedback loop between the test track and the R&D lab.

odonto.title: Franchise Ecosystem
odonto.description: Comprehensive solution for dental franchise network management, unifying clinical, financial, and administrative operations.
odonto.challenge_text: The scenario was fragmentation. With multiple franchises operating in silos, the network suffered from a lack of standardization and difficulty extracting intelligence from consolidated data. The technical challenge was architecting a multi-tenant system capable of managing everything from a clinic's micro-inventory to the entire network's macro-performance indicators, without sacrificing performance.
odonto.development_text: Over a year of continuous evolution, we built a modular platform. The backend acts as a robust backbone ensuring fiscal and contractual integrity, while the frontend delivers information-dense interfaces—like interactive dental charts and dynamic schedules—without losing fluidity. The complexity of disparate modules (Chat, Finance, IoT Inventory) was abstracted into a unified end-user experience.
odonto.result_text: The system became the network's central nervous system. Centralization eliminated operational bottlenecks, enabling managers to make real-time data-driven decisions and dentists to focus on patients, with the entire administrative flow automated, from scheduling to invoicing.

ndpz.title: Education Ecosystem
ndpz.description: Centralized operational management platform, unifying CRM, cash flow, and hybrid product sales (physical and digital).
ndpz.challenge_text: Company expansion created operational chaos: managing hybrid revenue (in-person tickets and digital sales) on isolated platforms generated a financial blind spot and prevented the CRM from having a single customer view, in addition to higher costs. The technical challenge was replacing the patchwork of spreadsheets and external gateways with a robust operational core, where cash flow integrity was priority zero, regardless of the product type sold.
ndpz.development_text: I developed a finance-centric architecture. Unlike common platforms, here every sale (whether a course or a ticket) starts primarily as a financial transaction reconciled with the payment gateway, ensuring cash flow integrity. On top of this core, I coupled delivery modules: a video player for e-learning, a code validator for in-person events, and a dynamic headless Landing Page where marketing updates content without deployments.
ndpz.result_text: The solution eliminated the need for 4 distinct SaaS tools. Today, the platform manages the full customer lifecycle: from capture on the Landing Page, through purchase integrated with Asaas, to content consumption or event check-in, with all financial data instantly reflecting in the administrative dashboard.
